feature.label: Eclipse Open System Description
feature.description: This feature provide a set of plugins to edit open system description models in the Eclipse Platform. The Open System Description format is an open format created in the S3P project (http://www.esterel-technologies.com/S3P.html) and a collaboration between Safran, Esterel Technology and Krono-Safe. The main goal of this format is to connect tools with a minimalist domain specific language. Hence, OSD is a dedicated language to describe a set of functions, their communications, their timing constraints and an identification of their final code implementations.
